scripts.clean:reports: rmdir /S /Q cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports
scripts.generate-report: marge cypress/reports/mochareports/report.json -f report -o cypress/reports/mochareports -t Automation-Report -p Automation-Title --charts true --autoOpen true
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test: npm run scripts || npm run posttest
